00041 const TittmColumnDefinition ANNOTATION_TABLE_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[] = {
00042   // m_columnName,        m_emptyOk, m_index, m_validRE
00043   { std::string("Probe Set ID"),    0, 0,  std::string("^[\\w\\d]+$"), NULL },
00044   { std::string("Associated Gene"), 0, 1, std::string("^(?:[\\/\\s_A-Z0-9]+)|(?:N\\/A)$"), NULL },
00045   { std::string("dbSNP RS ID"),  1, 2,
00046     std::string("^(?:rs\\d+(?:[|;\\s])*)+|(?:N/?A)$"), NULL },
00047   { std::string("Common Name"), 1, 3, std::string(".*") , NULL },
00048   { std::string("Chromosome"), 0, 4, std::string("^(?:\\d+|[Xx]|[yY])$"), NULL },
00049   { std::string("Physical Position"), 0, 5, std::string("^\\d+$"), NULL },
00050   { std::string("Genome Context"), 0, 6, std::string("^[\\-\\<\\>a-zA-Z\\[\\]\\/]+$"), NULL },
00051   { std::string("Design Strand"), 0, 7, std::string("^-?1$"), NULL },
00052   { std::string("Alleles Design Strand"), 1, 8, std::string("^[\\s\\/ACTGN\\-]+$"), NULL },
00053   { std::string("Allele Code"),  0, 9, std::string("^[\\s\\/A-Z\\-]+$"), NULL },
00054   { std::string("Gene Strand"), 1, 10, std::string("^(?:\\+)|(?:-)|(?:N\\/?A)$"), NULL },
00055   { std::string("Switch Design Strand to Report"), 0, 11, std::string("^[01]|NA$"), NULL },
00056   { std::string("Alleles Reported Strand"), 0, 12,  std::string("^[\\s\\/A-Z\\-]+$"), NULL },
00057   { std::string("Reported Strand"), 1, 13, std::string("^\\+|-|N\\/?A$"), NULL },
00058   { std::string("Type"), 0, 14, std::string("^snp|in-del|tiling|copy_number$"), NULL },
00059   { std::string("Validated"), 0, 15, std::string("^N|Y|N\\/?A$"), NULL },
00060   { std::string("DbSNP annot"), 1, 16, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00061   { std::string("PharmGKB Code"), 1, 17, std::string("^N\\/A|PA\\d+$"), NULL },
00062   { std::string("Alleles-Alias Reported Strand"), 1, 18, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00063   { std::string("Context Code"), 0, 19,  std::string("^(?:N\\/A)|(?:[\\s\\/\\d]+)$"), NULL },
00064   { std::string("Context Sequence"), 0, 20, std::string("^[\\-\\s\\[\\]\\<\\>ACGNTacgt\\/]+$"), NULL },
00065 };

00070 /*****************************************************************************/
00071 /**
00072  * AnnotationTableModel::AnnotationTableModel
00073  * Synopsis:
00074  * Main constructor to read the probe set filter file and stash the data
00075  * into the model.
00076  *
00077  * @param rte - RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00078  * @param probeSetFilterFileName - the input file to read.
00079  */
00080 /*****************************************************************************/
00081 AnnotationTableModel::AnnotationTableModel(const RunTimeEnvironment &rte,
00082     const std::string & annotationFileName) :
00083     TranslationInputTsvTableModel(rte, annotationFileName,
00084                                   ANNOTATION_TABLE_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS,
00085                                   (sizeof(ANNOTATION_TABLE_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(ANNOTATION_TABLE_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), false, NULL)
00086 {
00087 
00088   for (int row = 0; row < size(); row++) {
00089 
00090     m_probeSetIndex[m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_ID]].push_back(row);
00091 
00092   }
00093 
00094 
00095 }
00096 // end AnnotationTableModel::AnnotationTableModel
